fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £200 Save £170 at Mellieha Bay in Malta, leaving l January and staying at the four star Hotel Seabank for seven nights on a half board basis for £199. Includes Air 2000 charter flights from Gatwick with First Choice (0870 750 0001). Under £300 Travellers Cities (01959 540700) has three nights' B&B at the three-star Hotel Comtes de Nice near the Promenade des Anglais for £209 (normally £269) until 20 March (excluding Christmas and New Year). BA flights from Heathrow or Gatwick. Treat yourself after the Christmas exertions with an Inntravel Shortbreak (01653 629021) of two nights to Seville, reputedly the birthplace of tapas and riddled with magnificent sights. Departing 4 January and costing £299, this includes two nights B&B at the atmospheric three star Las Casas de la Juderia Hotel and scheduled Iberia flights from Heathrow. Under £400 New Year in Norfolk still possible with Norfolk Country Cottages (01603 871872) in either The Meal House, a converted barn in the village of Narborough, between Swaffham and Kings Lynn, which sleeps four for £360 or Anchor Lodge on the banks of the river Bure at Horning in the heart of the Broads, which sleeps six for £639. Both prices are for a one week stay. Three nights in New York in January and February for £309 with Bon Voyage (0800 316 0194). BA flights from Heathrow, accommodation (room-only). Must include a Saturday and be booked by 28 January. Manchester flights just £10 extra. Under £600 A girls' grooming weekend in Paris at the city's only Relais & Chateaux Hotel de Vigny which includes two nights' B&B, spa beauty and make-up sessions and discounts at Printemps Haussmann boutiques. Available up to 31 December for £545. Contact Hotel de Vigny direct (00 33 1 42 99 80 80). The Miami Art Deco Festival takes place from 18 to 20 January with jazz, street theatre, artwork and tributes to the area's architecture and the period from which it grew. America Direct (0870 889 0827) has seven nights (room-only) at the three-star Holiday Inn South Beach. Virgin flights from Gatwick on 16 January for £595. Other hotels available to suit all budgets. Under £700 Join the Arts Square Winter Festival in St Petersburg (27 to 31 December or 1 to 5 January) from £668 with Steppes East (01285 651010). Evening concerts, receptions and gala events. Just step out of the five-star Grand Hotel Europe where you will have four nights' accommodation after arriving by BA from Heathrow. Includes ticket to one show. Under £900 The 9th Gourmet Festival takes place in St Moritz, Switzerland, from 25 January to 2 February. A celebration of 'flavours from the islands of the world' by 10 teams of chefs, hosted at three different hotels with the competition grand finale taking place on the resort's frozen lake. Join in and stay seven nights at the four star Hotel Steffani for £812 including Swissair flights from Heathrow to Zurich, half board and transfers by the swish Swiss rail service. Inghams (020 8780 4433). Over £1,000 Scotland's Dallas Lodge, in the north-east, is a perfect seventeenth-century house for festive parties. Sleeps 12, with its own lake and a river for fishing. Still available for Christmas and New Year at a reduced weekly rate of £2,880 from Scottish Chapters (020 7722 0722). Finally kick the nicotine addiction in 2002 with a seven-night 'Stop Smoking Package' at the five-star Thalassa Sofitel Vilalara Hotel in the Algarve. A programme of five daily thalassotherapy treatments, half-board accommodation, flights TAP from Heathrow or GB Airways from Gatwick, available 2 January to 22 March for £1120. Contact Erna Low (020 7590 1777). Post Christmas detox at the Palazzo Arzaga resort and spa. Built around a 15th century country house close by Italy's Lake Garda their Ideal Weight programme of spa treatments, exercise and gymnastics in the mineral rich pool will soon have you fighting fit. For reservations call the Palazzo Arzaga direct (0039 030 680 600). The cost is from £1069 for six nights which includes full board with the Arzaga Light menu (but excluding beverages). Ryanair (0870 156 9569) operate direct flights from Stansted to Brescia which is just a 15 minute drive from the hotel. Penguins galore on 13 night fly-cruises to the Antarctic Peninsula departing 9, 17 and 25 January. Starting with two nights in Buenos Aires, onward by charter flight to Ushuaia, Argentina, then joining the ship Marco Polo to explore this spectacular region. Exact route and landfalls are dependent on weather conditions. Priced at £2,299 (a saving of £951) including scheduled flights (either BA direct from Gatwick or Iberia via Madrid from Heathrow) and charter flights to and from Ushuaia, all meals and entertainment during cruise, transfers, sightseeing and specialist lectures. Free connections from main UK regional airports. Reservations Orient Lines (020 7959 5900). · Prices are per person based on two sharing. All flights are return.
